101.title: The Vulture
101.author: by Adam-Troy Castro ; interior illustrations by Mike Zeck.
101.series: 2002) Spider-Man : Secret of the Sinister Six
notes: Summary (from OCLC): The Gentleman has been the secret mastermind of wars and acts of crime around the world, including the murder of Peter Parker's parents. Years ago, the Gentleman discovered that Peter Parker is secretly Spider-Man. He brainwashed Peter's long-lost sister and turned her into the super-villainess known as Pity. A new Sinister Six (The Gentleman, Pity, Doctor Octopus, Electro, the Vulture, and Mysterio) will enact the final act of vengeance
destroy Peter Parker!

152.title: Vusi Goes Back : a comic book about the history of South Africa
152.author: concept & editorial input, Rob Berold ; research & script, Dick Cloete ; script & artwork, Andy Mason ; lettering, Biddy Partridge.

publication info.publisher: Prezanian Comix in association with the Environmental Development Agency

notes: Summary: From the city of Johannesburg, Vusi goes back to visit his family in a remote area of the Transkei. His grandfather tells him about the history of his people, and Vusi learns that the way he lives today is the result of what has happened in the past. 1. South Africa
History
Comic books, strips, etc. 2. South African comics. I. Cloete, Dick. II. Mason, Andy. III. Berold, Robert, 1948- a. Africana. Call no.: PN6790.S63C55 1982
